text: Patrick Arnold Shriver Schwarzenegger (born September 18, 1993) is an American actor and model. He is known for his roles in the television series The Staircase (2022) and American Sports Story (2024). He also played Luke Riordan/Golden Boy in the first season of The Boys spin-off series Gen V. ==Personal life== Schwarzenegger was born on September 18, 1993 in Santa Monica, California, and raised in Los Angeles, California. He is the oldest son of author and journalist Maria Shriver and Austrian-born bodybuilder, actor, and former Governor of California Arnold Schwarzenegger. Since 2015, he has been in a relationship with model Abby Champion. They announced their engagement in December 2023. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Kennedy family Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Santa Monica, California Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:Models from Los Angeles
title: Patrick Schwarzenegger
